metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5816 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: An integer overflow error within the "identify()" function (internal/dcraw_common.cpp) in LibRaw versions prior to 0.18.12 can be exploited to trigger a division by zero via specially crafted NOKIARAW file (Note: This vulnerability is caused due to an incomplete fix of CVE-2018-5804).

notes.Note: alexmurray> Issue caused by an incomplete fix for CVE-2018-5804

criterions.comment: darktable package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
